name: Duke Energy Corporation
summary: Duke Energy Corporation is one of the largest electric power and natural gas holding companies in the United States, headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina. Serving over 7 million customers across the Southeast and Midwest, Duke Energy operates a diverse portfolio of power generation assets and is investing heavily in clean energy and grid modernization. The company is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker DUK and ranked 141st on the 2024 Fortune 500 list.
